mapper.select: SELECT sui.id AS user_id, sui.user_name, sui.phone_number AS mobile, urs.role_name AS roleName, sci.company_name AS companyName, ssi.avatar FROM company_admin AS ca JOIN sys_staff_info AS ssi ON ssi.id =ca.staff_id join sys_user_info sui ON ssi.user_id = sui.id and ssi.`status` in (0, 3) LEFT JOIN sys_company_info sci ON sci.id = ssi.comp_id LEFT JOIN union_role_staff urs ON urs.staff_id = ssi.id where sui.status IN (0, 3) AND ca.company_id = #{companyId}
